Literature Review: The economic backgrounds of politicians have been a subject of increasing interest in recent years, with scholars seeking to understand the factors that contribute to the unequal economic makeup of institutions. This literature review aims to provide an overview of the current state of research on this topic, highlighting the common threads that have emerged and the areas where further study is needed.
